channel.title: Information Required For UN OCHA 'Open Humanitarianism' Project
channel.description:
The IATI Technical Team was recently contacted by Leandro Salazar with the following request:
"I''m currently working at the United Nations Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs on a project that we call 'Open Humanitarianism'. We are basically collecting information on 'Open Government' to start establishing the pillars of our project.
My colleagues and I would really appreciate any suggestions on documents, websites, authors or any other help related to that matter."

item.title: Information Required For UN OCHA 'Open Humanitarianism' Project
item.dc:creator: Wendy
item.description:
The IATI Technical Team was recently contacted by Leandro Salazar with the following request:

"I’'m currently working at the United Nations Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs on a project that we call ‘Open Humanitarianism’. We are basically collecting information on ‘Open Government’ to start establishing the pillars of our project.

My colleagues and I would really appreciate any suggestions on documents, websites, authors or any other help related to that matter."
